ComicInfo.Title: Shadow Over Sinnsport!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:10:05. [CVDB145152] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:46:44. [Issue ID 243502]
ComicInfo.Characters: Professor Eggbert,Professor Lucifer Conal,Elvira Mistress of the Dark
ComicInfo.Summary: Shadow Over Sinnsport!: Elvira gives a lecture at Mastodonic University in Sinnsport, New Jersey. The next day, Professor Lucifer Conal tells Elvira that Professor Eggbert died suddenly. Conal becomes enraged to learn that punk-rocker Lawrence Q. Eggbert Jr is the will's sole beneficiary. Lawrence and Elvira are attacked by primal swamp monsters at a punk rock club. Elvira happens upon the Classics Delineated version of The Heckronomicon. They are attacked by weird otherworldly creatures, lead by Conal. When Conal reads the Heckronomicon comic, it summons a Cthulhu-like monster that carries him to another world.
